Class PersonalLoan

java.lang.Object
Loan
PersonalLoan
public class PersonalLoan extends Loan
Represents a Personal Loan, extending the Loan class. This loan type is intended for personal financial needs.

  • Constructor Details

    • PersonalLoan

      public PersonalLoan(double principal, float interestRate, int duration, String loanType, Guarantor guarantorDetails, Account account, double personalIncome, double annualIncome)
      Constructs a new PersonalLoan object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      principal - The principal amount of the loan.
      interestRate - The interest rate of the loan.
      duration - The duration of the loan.
      loanType - The type of loan.
      guarantorDetails - The details of the guarantor.
      account - The details of the guarantor.
      personalIncome - The current monthly personal income.
      annualIncome - The past annual income of the applicant.

  • Method Details

    • isEligibleForLoan

      public Boolean isEligibleForLoan(Customer customer)
      Checks if the person is eligible for the loan based on their current monthly income and past annual income.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer applying for the loan.
      Returns:
      true if the person is eligible for the loan, false otherwise.
